reminder.title: Reminders
reminder.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this reminder?
reminder.removeScheduleConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove this schedule?
reminder.noSchedules: No schedules added. The reminder will be saved as a draft.
reminder.pausedCannotEdit: Paused reminders cannot be edited. Please activate it first.
reminder.endedEditInfo: This reminder has ended. Expired schedules have been removed. Adding new schedules will reactivate it.
reminder.statusDraft: This reminder is a draft. Add schedules to activate it.
reminder.statusPaused: This reminder is paused and cannot be edited. Activate it first to make changes.
reminder.statusEnded: This reminder has ended. You can edit it to create new schedules.
reminder.editWarningExpiredSchedules:
This reminder has ended and some schedules have expired. When you save:
- Expired schedules will be removed
- If you add new schedules, the reminder will be reactivated
- If you don't add schedules, it will remain ended

validation.textTooLong: Reminder text is too long (max 500 characters)
validation.scheduleRequired: At least one schedule is required
validation.selectWeekDays: Please select at least one day of the week
validation.selectMonthDays: Please select at least one day of the month
validation.selectMonths: Please select at least one month
validation.invalidTimeRange: Please set a valid time range
validation.noChangesDetected: No changes detected. Please make changes before saving.
validation.futureDateTime: Date and time should be in the future
validation.futureTime: Time should be in the future
validation.toDateMustBeAfterFromDate: 'To' date must be greater than or equal to 'From' date
validation.toTimeMustBeAfterFromTime: 'To' time must be greater than or equal to 'From' time
validation.invalidTimeRangeStepUnit: Only Minutes and Hours are allowed for time range steps
validation.oneTimeShouldBeNull: One-time configuration should not be set for this rule type
validation.intervalShouldBeNull: Interval configuration should not be set for this rule type
validation.complexShouldBeNull: Complex configuration should not be set for this rule type

modal.unsavedChangesMessage: Are you sure you want to leave? Your changes will not be saved.
